original_text: So the priests, and the Levites, and the porters, and the singers, and some of the people, and the Nethinims, and all Israel, dwelt in their cities; and when the seventh month came, the children of Israel were in their cities.
korean_text: 이와 같이 제사장들과 레위 사람들과 문지기들과 노래하는 자들과 백성 몇 명과 느디님 사람들과 온 이스라엘 자손이 다 자기들의 성읍에 거주하였느니라

sentences.original_text: So the priests dwelt in their cities
and the Levites dwelt in their cities
and the porters dwelt in their cities
and the singers dwelt in their cities
and some of the people dwelt in their cities
sentences.korean_translation: 백성 중 어떤 이들도 그들의 성읍에 거주했습니다

sentences.original_text: and the Nethinims dwelt in their cities
and all Israel dwelt in their cities
and when the seventh month came
the children of Israel were in their cities
